pages.text: The Blood-Infused Spellbook combines the power of Iron's Spells with Blood Magic's sacrificial arts. This unique tome can be progressively enhanced through $(blood)six tiers of blood infusion$(), each granting powerful new abilities.$(br2)Unlike regular spellbooks, this hybrid tome grows stronger as you feed it more Life Essence at the Blood Altar.

$(blood)Blood-Powered Spellbook$()$(br2)A spellbook infused with the power of blood magic. Place any Iron's Spells spellbook in the Blood Altar to create one, then right-click to upgrade it.$(br2)$(bold)Base Stats:$() 5 spell slots$(br)$(bold)Max Tier:$() 6 (12 slots, +300 mana)

pages.title: Initial Infusion
pages.text: To create a Blood-Infused Spellbook:$(br2)1. Obtain any $(item)Spellbook$() from Iron's Spells$(br)2. $(bold)Place the spellbook in the Blood Altar$()$(br)3. Ensure the altar has $(blood)5,000 LP$() stored$(br)4. Wait for the altar to craft it$(br2)The spellbook transforms into a $(blood)Tier 1 Blood-Infused Spellbook$(). $(thing)All your equipped spells are preserved!$()

pages.title: Tier Progression
pages.text: Each tier grants $(thing)+50 Max Mana$() and more spell slots:$(br2)$(bold)Tiers 1-3: Slot & Mana Bonuses$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 1:$() Weak Orb, 5k LP $(thing)6 slots, +50 mana$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 2:$() Apprentice Orb, 10k LP $(thing)7 slots, +100 mana$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 3:$() Magician Orb, 25k LP $(thing)8 slots, +150 mana$()

pages.title: Advanced Tiers
pages.text: $(bold)Tiers 4-6: LP Cost & Lifesteal$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 4:$() Master Orb, 50k LP $(thing)10 slots, +200 mana, -10%% LP$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 5:$() Archmage Orb, 100k LP $(thing)11 slots, +250 mana, -20%% LP$()$(li)$(blood)Tier 6:$() Transcendent Orb, 175k LP $(thing)12 slots, +300 mana, +5%% lifesteal$()

pages.title: Upgrading
pages.text: To upgrade your spellbook to the next tier:$(br2)1. Place the required Blood Orb tier (or higher) in the altar$(br)2. Ensure the altar has enough LP$(br)3. Right-click the altar while holding your Blood-Infused Spellbook$(br2)The spellbook's tooltip shows your current tier, bonuses, and the requirements for the next upgrade. JEI also displays all upgrade recipes.

pages.title: LP Casting
pages.text: When you don't have enough mana, the Blood-Infused Spellbook can $(blood)consume LP instead$()!$(br2)$(bold)Requirements:$()$(li)A $(item)Blood Orb$() in your inventory or curio slot$(li)Sufficient LP in your Soul Network$(br2)The LP cost is $(thing)100 LP per mana$() by default. Higher tier spellbooks reduce this cost by up to 20%%. This can be configured or disabled in the mod settings.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: To use the Blood-Infused Spellbook:$(br2)$(li)$(mod)Iron's Spellbooks$() must be installed$(li)An active $(l:bloodmagicnv:altar/binding)Soul Network$()$(li)A Blood Altar with the appropriate orb tier$(br2)The spellbook's rarity and enchantment glint change based on its infusion tier, making it easy to see how powerful your tome has become.
